name: Amerusen
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Kikuropu
Kikuropu's 3rd spell. He shoots stone missles from his elbows.

name: Amu Shizaruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Kikuropu
Kikuropu's 2nd spell. His hands transform into sharp scissors to slash his opponents.

name: Amuruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Kikuropu
Kikuropu's 1st spell. It grants him tremendously big arms to smash his opponents.

name: Baltro (Armored) {Emulated Armor}
effect: This card is placed on a regular Baltro MAMODO card when a Zeberu SPELL card is played for the Baltro MAMODO card. The regular Baltro MAMODO card remains in play when this card is sent to the Discard Pile. [1MP] This card may Attack without using a SPELL card (Total Power=5000, Damage=2). Partner: Steng
He descends upon his opponents with his big, powerful, destructive body.

name: Baltro {Brutal Real Form}
effect: [In Play] When the Baltro (armored) MAMODO card placed over this card is sent to the Discard Pile, your opponent must turn 2 pages of their Spell Book. Partner: Steng
This guy is so weak that he has to hide himself in a big metal body!

name: Bao Zakeruga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 4th spell. It summons a gigantic dragon-shaped lightning.

name: Bao Zakeruga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. If a MAMODO card is used as a SACRIFICE or to PROTECT against this SPELL card, it must be send to the Discard Pile regardless of its status. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 4th spell. "BAOOOOOOOOO!"

name: Barjuron
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. The Power of this card is determined by flipping a coin 3 times. The number of heads you get times 2000 equals this card's Power. Mamodo: Pokkerio
Pokkerio's 2nd spell. It makes many tree warriors appear.

name: Best Friends
effect: Each player can have only 1 PARTNER card of their choice in play; the rest must be sent to the Discard Pile. If a player has no in-play PARTNER cards, they may put a PARTNER card from any pocket of their Spell Book in play.
"Together you and I will find a way to happiness. There's always a light at the end of the tunnel."

name: Big Relief
effect: Turn 1 of your MAMODO cards to normal status and get 2 MP. This effect can be applied when more than 2 MAMODO cards are in play.
"Finally, there is someone I can trust in this battle..."

name: Biraitsu
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you Damage to your opponent's Spell Book, add 2 Damage if your Total Power is more than 8000 when Attacking. Mamodo: Robnos
Robnos' 1st spell. A hyperspeed beam that slashes at an opponent.

name: Brago {Dark Mamodo}
effect: [2MP] Add 2000 Power when this card Attacks. Partner: Sherry
"I'm positive there are many mamodo that don't want to fight against me."

name: Brago {Self-Possessed Warrior}
effect: [2MP] Increase Damage by 1 when this card inflicts Damage. Partner: Sherry
He is a strong mamodo who looks for opponents day and night.

name: Brago {Self-Possession}
effect: [1MP] See your opponent's open Spell Book pages at any time during your turn, and get 2 MP if there are no Defensive SPELL cards in the pockets. Partner: Sherry
"Do you want me to end your life now?"

name: British Gentleman
effect: [In Play] Every time your opponent turns back a page of their Spell Book, reduce their MP by 2. Mamodo: Kikuropu
"As a British gentleman, I will teach you some manners."

name: Checkmate!
effect: Flip a coin; If it's heads, the next SPELL card you play in the same turn injures 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards instead of Damaging their Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. This SPELL card cannot be defended. [ALL Mamodo]
"GGGGGGGrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!"

name: Djem
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] You can turn back a page of your Spell Book. This effect can be played only once per turn. Mamodo: Yopopo
She is a tomboy that lives in a small village in England.

name: Doremikeru
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Yopopo
Yopopo's 2nd spell. He creates a heavy impact wave with his singing.

name: Dorsen
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Gofure
Gofure's 2nd spell. His tail turns to rock and shoots rock spikes at opponents.

name: Doruk
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Gofure
Gofure's 1st spell. He transforms into a beast to attack opponents.

name: Ei Garon
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin; if it's heads, this SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Maruss
Maruss' 3rd spell. It gives Maruss the power to control the iron balls, even from the ground.

name: Eido
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Make the Power of an opponent's MAMODO card of your choice 0. Mamodo: Hyde
"You can be my girlfriend!"

name: Emeron
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Kikuropu
Kikuropu's 4th spell. His expandable burning fists attack opponents.

name: Fein {Tactical Enemy}
effect: [Declare To Use] Choose a MAMODO card from your opponent's Spell Book and send it to the Discard Pile. This effect can be played only once per game (per player). Partner: Sebé
"I will be the King. I will have more power, and nobody will disobey me."

name: Folgore's Dance
effect: Reduce your opponent's MP by 4.
"Hey, Hey. Let's Dance all Day. Boing, Boing, Boogie, Boogie, Boogie."

name: Freezudo
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you Damage your opponent's Spell Book or Injure your opponent's MAMODO card, they cannot play any PARTNER cards until their next END PHASE. Mamodo: Reycom
Reycom's 2nd spell. It freezes opponents so that they can't move.

name: Friendship Curry
effect: Reduce all player's MP to 0.
Kiyo made the best(?) curry with help from his friends!

name: Ganzu Garon
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin twice; if you get heads twice, this SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Maruss
Maruss' 2nd spell. It shoots random iron balls to shatter his opponents.

name: Garon
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Maruss
Maruss' 1st spell. Heavy iron chains crush his opponent.

name: Gigano Garanzu
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Marusss
Maruss' 4th spell. It animates a gigantic iron armor that attacks opponents.

name: Giganoreis
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Brago
Brago's 3rd spell. A stronger form of Reis, it hits opponents with an energy cluster.

name: Giganoreis
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Damage by this SPELL card cannot be increased past a total of 4 Damage. Mamodo: Brago
Brago's 3rd spell. A compressed energy bullet that's stronger then Reis.

name: Gikor
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Reycom
Reycom's 1st spell. It fires pieces of ice against opponents.

name: Gofure (Transformed) {Real Self}
effect: This card must be placed on a regular Gofure MAMODO card. [In Play] Your opponent must turn a page of their Spell Book when this card is put in play. Partner: Renji
...not a puppy but a vicious mamodo transformed by a spell.

name: Gofure {Imitated Friend}
effect: [In Play] Your opponent cannot play any SPELL cards during the turn this card is put in play. Partner: Renji
Zatch met a puppy when he was feeling sad, but the puppy was actually...

name: Gravirei
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you Damage your opponent's Spell Book or Injure your opponent's MAMODO card, they cannot play any SPELL cards until their next END PHASE. Mamodo: Brago
Brago's 2nd spell. It pins opponents down with a strong gravitational pull.

name: Gravirei
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you Damage your opponent's Spell Book or Injure your opponent's MAMODO card, reduce the Power of all your opponent's MAMODO cards by 2000 until their next END PHASE. Mamodo: Brago
Brago's 2st spell. Pressure from above smashes his opponent's body.

name: Haru
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] This PARTNER's MAMODO can use any SPELL cards without paying the MP cost during the BATTLE PHASE of this turn. Mamodo: Sugino
A cold-hearted human that attacks a botanical garden to practice his mamodo spells.

name: Here Comes Zatch Bell!
effect: Put a MAMODO card from any pocket of your Spell Book in play.
Zatch flew on a big eagle from England.

name: Hold On!
effect: Flip a coin twice, if you get heads atleast once, reduce Damage you received this turn by 1. [All Mamodo]
"No way - I won't let anybody pass through here."

name: Hosokawa
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Reduce your opponent's MP by 3 to increase your own MP by 3. Mamodo: Reycom
He finds Reycom and uses him as a means to get revenge.

name: Hyde {Rider On The Wind}
effect: [1MP] Select an Eido PARTNER card in any pocket of your Spell Book and attach it to this card. Partner: Eido
He is a cool mamodo with the power to control the wind.

name: I Asked For Fish!
effect: Flip a coin twice; get MP equal to the number of heads you get times 2.
"Eat if raw, it's better for you..."

name: Ion Gravirei
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you Damage your opponent's Spell Book or Injure your opponent's MAMODO card, they cannot play any SPELL cards until their next END PHASE. Mamodo: Brago
Brago's 4th spell. Its uncomparable gravity pull is even stronger then Gravirei.

name: Ion Gravirei
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Flip a coin twice; if you get heads twice, your opponent cannot PROTECT their Spell Book from Damage. Mamodo: Brago
Brago's 4th spell. A powerful spell that sweeps away everything in sight.

name: Iron Man Folgore
effect: Flip a coin; if it's heads, select a PARTNER card of your choice from your Discard Pile and attach it to an in-play MAMODO card. If it's tails, you may continue to flip until it's heads, playing 2 MP costs for each opportunity.
"Invincible Folgore~, Iron Man Folgore~~!"

name: Ivy Kinoyama
effect: Turn 1 of your MAMODO cards to normal status.
Manager of the Machinoki Botanical Garden.

name: Jikerdor
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you Damage your opponent's Spell Book or Injure your opponent's MAMODO card, flip a coin; if it's heads, they cannot play and SPELL cards until their next END PHASE. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 3rd spell.

name: Jikir
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you Damage your opponent's Spell Book or Injure your opponent's MAMODO card, flip a coin; if heads, your Spell Book and all of your MAMODO cards don't receive Damage of Injury until your opponent's next END PHASE. Mamodo: Hyde
Hyde's 1st spell. A sudden and powerful wind force emits from his palm!

name: Jikirga
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you Damage your opponent's SPell Book or Injure your opponent's MAMODO card, your Spell Book and all of your MAMODO cards don't receive Damage or Injury until your opponent's next END PHASE. Mamodo: Hyde
Hyde's 2nd spell. His strongest offensive spell, it attacks with violent wind pressure.

name: Juron
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. When you Damage your opponent's Spell Book or Injure your opponent's MAMODO card, flip a coin; if it's heads, they cannot play any SPELL cards until their next END PHASE. Mamodo: Sugino
Sugino's 1st spell. It halts an opponent's movement by controlling plants.

name: Juruk
effect: Flip a coin; if heads, your Spell BOok and all of your MAMODO cards don't receive Damage of Injury until your opponent's next END PHASE. This SPELL card cannot be defended. Mamodo: Pokkerio
Pokkerio's 3rd spell. It makes the trees protect him and his partner.

name: Kanchomé {Invincible Fellow}
effect: [2MP] Negate an Injury to this card when it is in Injured Status. Partner: Parco Folgore
"I've got lots of sweets in my pocket."

name: Kanchomé {Lucky Guy}
effect: [Declare To Use] Re-do your coin toss. This effect can be played only once per turn. Partner: Parco Folgore
"Iron Man Kanchomé! Invincible Kanchomé!"

name: Kanchomé {Odd Animal}
effect: [Declare To Use] Your opponent must re-do their coin toss. This effect can be played only once per turn. Partner: Parco Folgore
"Munch, munch, munch..."

name: Kikuropu {Kikuropu's Armor}
effect: [In Play] This card cannot be Injured by a SPELL card of 6000 Power or less, although the SPELL card's effect is still valid. Partner: British Gentleman
He is a mamodo whose body is protected by hard volcanic rocks for best defensive performance.

name: kind King
effect: Add 3000 Power to 1 of your MAMODO cards of your choice during this turn.
"I was so upset when I saw Kolulu disappear back to the mamodo world."

name: Kind Kiyo
effect: Use your opponent's PARTNER card's effect that works for their MAMODO cards for 1 of your MAMODO cards instead. The PARTNER card is not sent to the Discard Pile after use.
Today Kiyo is suddenly kind and is eating raw yellowtail head first. Something seems different...

name: Kiyo Takamine
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] The next SPELL card this PARTNER's MAMODO plays cannot be defended. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
He is a genius, but bored with life...that is until he encounters Zatch.

name: Kiyo Takamine
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Turn a page of your Spell Book. This effect can be played only once per turn. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
"Become strong, Zatch - I will stand by you."

name: Kiyo's Anger
effect: Send 1 of your in-play MAMODO cards of your choice to the Discard Pile.
"Guys...that's enough."

name: Koko
effect: [In Play] Every time your opponent's MAMODO card is sent to the Discard Pile, they must turn a page of their Spell Book. Mamodo: Zofis
She is Sherry's best friend before Zofis turns her into a cold-hearted puppet.

name: Kolulu (Transformed) {Mad Warrior}
effect: This card must be placed on a regular Kolulu MAMODO card. [1MP] Increase the Power of this card by 1000 when it Defends. Partner: Lori
This is how Kolulu transforms when she is forced to battle.

name: Kolulu {Kind Girl}
effect: [In Play] Get 4 MP when this card is sent to the Discard Pile. Partner: Lori
She is a gentle mamodo that doesn't normally have the will to fight.

name: Koporuk
effect: Flip a coin twice; if you get heads at least once, negate your opponent's Attack. Mamodo: Kanchomé
Kanchomé's 2nd spell. A shrinking spell that makes him weaker.

name: Kory
effect: Flip a coin; if it's heads, select a PARTNER card from your Discard Pile and attach it to an in-play MAMODO card of your choice.
"Hey, you wanna be my friend?"

name: Let's Get Out Of Here!
effect: Flip a coin twice; if you get heads at least once, negate your opponent's Attack. [All Mamodo]
Escape is sometimes the best tactic.

name: Lori
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Send Kolulu (Transformed) to the Discard Pile to keep the regular Kolulu MAMODO card in play. Mamodo: Kolulu
Lori decides to become Kolulu's older sister and take care of her.

name: Ma Seshield
effect: Negate your opponent's Attack card when you win the Battle as a Defender. Mamodo: Tia
Tia's 3rd spell. It is one of the most powerful shields against a frontal attack.

name: Maruss {Betrayer}
effect: [2MP] Negate the effect of an opponent's MAMODO card of your choic. Partner: Rembrant
"You are weaker than me... how can I forget it?"

name: Megumi
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Negate the SPELL card your opponent just played. Mamodo: Tia
She is a popular pop idol.

name: Megumi's Concert
effect: Get 3 MP. Your opponent flips a coin; if it's heads, they also get 3 MP.
"I sing because I want to make people happy."

name: Mikeru
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Yopopo
Yopopo's 1st spell. Yopopo's singing turns into an attack.

name: Mr. Takamine (Seitaro Takamine)
effect: Send 1 of your opponent's Spell cards of your choice from any pocket of their Spell Book except the last page to the Discard Pile. Pay MP costs equal to the Spell card's original MP cost. If you don't have enough MP, pay all the MP your have.
Kiyo's father. He found and rescued Zatch in a forest in England.

name: Mrs. Takamine (Hana Takamine)
effect: Send 1 of your opponent's EVENT cards of your choice from any pocket of their Spell Book to the Discard Pile. Pay MP costs equal to the EVENT card's original MP cost. If you don't have enough MP, pay all the MP you have.
Kiyo's mother. She is always concerned about Kiyo and Zatch.

name: Naomi
effect: None of your opponent's MAMODO cards can SACRIFICE or PROTECT their Spell Book from Damage this turn.
She keeps bullying Zatch. Her toy car's name is "Je t'aime".

name: Parco Folgore
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Send an opponent's in-play PARTNER card of your choice to the Discard Pile. Mamodo: Kanchomé
He is a world-famous superstar.

name: Periko
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Your opponent cannot use any "Attack" SPELL cards this turn. Mamodo: Pokkerio
He wants to use Pokkerio's powers to become a millionare.

name: Pokkerio {Vegetation Mamodo}
effect: [In Play] Any SPELL cards with a "Wood" Attribute can be used by this card. Partner: Periko
He is a mamodo that encounters Brago in the jungle, and has the power to control trees.

name: Ponygon
effect: Turn a page of your opponent's Spell Book. You may see the cards in the open pockets.
His real name is Schneider.

name: Poruk
effect: When you win the battle as an Attacher, reduce your opponent's MP by 3. Mamodo: Kanchomé
Kanchomé's 1st spell. He can transform into anything he desires.

name: Professor Dartagnan
effect: Select 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards. Your opponent can neither play any SPELL cards for that MAMODO nor apply the effect of that MAMODO until your opponent's next END PHASE.
Forest Spirit?

name: Purpose of the Battle
effect: Add 200 Power to all of your MAMODO cards with a PARTNER card attached until your opponent's next END PHASE.
"Why do I have to team with such weak humans in battle?"

name: Radom
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. name: Raja Jugaro
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Sugino

name: Rashield
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as a Defender. Mamodo: Zatch Bell

name: Rashield
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as a Defender. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 2nd spell. With an electric shock, this huge shield bounces back an opponent's attack.

name: Ready!
effect: Flip a coin, if it's heads, the next SPELL card you play in the same turn cannot be defended. This SPELL card cannot be defended. [All Mamodo]

name: Rei Buruk
effect: Send 2 in-play Robnos (Double) MAMODO cards to the Discard Pile to put a Robnos (Complete) MAMODO card from any pocket of your Spell Book in play, OR send an in-play Robnos (Complete) MAMODO card to the Discard Pile to put 2 Robnos (Double) Mamodo cards in play. This SPELL cannot be defended. Mamodo: Robnos
Robnos' 2nd spell. It unites two twin Robnos bodies.

name: Reis
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Brago

name: Reis
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Damage by this SPELL cannot be increased past a total of 3 Damage. Mamodo: Brago
Brago's 1st spell. A gravity cluster fired from his hand strikes opponents!

name: Rembrant
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Negate 1 of your opponent's "Attack" Spell cards. Mamodo: Maruss

name: Renji
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Double the Damage when this PARTNER's MAMODO inflicts Damage. Mamodo: Gofure

name: Reycom {Evil Tool}
effect: [In Play] Add 1000 Power when a PARTNER card is attached. Partner: Hosakawa

name: Robnos (Complete) {Maximum Power}
effect: [In Play] When this card is placed on the Gamemat, bring a Robnos MAMODO card (either "Double" or "Complete") from your Discard Pile to the pocket this card was in. Get 2 MP in addition. Partner: Ruku

name: Robnos (Double) {Two In One}
effect: A maximum of 2 Robnos (Double) cards may be in play at the same time. [Declare To Use] Attack twice with a Belights SPELL card if 2 Robnos (Double) MAMODO cards are in play. Partner: Ruku

name: Ruku
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] You may use a Biraitsu SPELL card in any pocket of your Spell Book. Mamodo: Robnos
He acts like a bully, but he's actually a wimp.

name: Saisu
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Tia
Tia's 2nd spell. Wind blades slash opponents.

name: Sebé
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Add 4000 Power to the SPELL cards this PARTNER's MAMODO plays. Mamodo: Fein

name: Seoshi
effect: Negate your opponent's Attack when you win the Battle as a Defender. Mamodo: Tia

name: Sherry
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Increase Damage by 2 when this PARTNER's MAMODO inflicts Damage. Mamodo: Brago
Sherry wants Kiyo to drop out of the battle of 100 mamodo.

name: Sherry
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] When this PARTNER's MAMODO card Injures an opponent's MAMODO card that used the "SACRIFICE" or "PROTECT" effect, send the Injured MAMODO card to the Discard Pile. Mamodo: Brago
"My goal is to end this battle as soon as possible."

name: Stay Focused!
effect: Negate your opponent's Attack when you win the Battle as a Defender. If your opponent's Attack inflicts Damage, get MP equal to 2 MP equal to 2 times the number of pages turned as Damage. [All Mamodo]

name: Steng
effect: [Send This Card To The Discard Pile] Negate 1 of your opponent's "Defend" Spell cards. Mamodo: Baltro
"Ha ha ha...this is a great snack to go with my drink."

name: Sugino {Tactician}
effect: [Declare To Use] Reduce the MP cost of a Spell card used by this card by 1. Reduce the Power of the same spell card by 1000. Partner: Haru

name: Suzy Mizuno
effect: Both players cannot apply any effects of in-play PARTNER cards during this turn.
Kiyo's classmate, she understands him well.

name: Suzy's Lucky Fruit
effect: Flip a coin twice; turn back a number of pages of your Spell Book equal to the heads you flipped, and turn forward a number of pages of your Spell Book equal to the tails you flipped.

name: The Will To Protect
effect: Add 3000 Power to 1 of your MAMODO cards of your choice during your opponent's next turn.
"Power grows stronger and stronger as we think of the people we want to protect."

name: Tia {Along With Megumi}
effect: [1MP] Select a Megumi PARTNER card in any pocket of your Spell Book and attach it to this card. Partner: Megumi

name: Tia {Obstinacy}
effect: [5MP] Negate an Injury to this card. Partner: Megumi

name: Tia {Reliable Partner}
effect: [In Play] Add 1000 Power to all of your MAMODO cards when more than 2 MAMODO cards (including this card are in play. Partner: Megumi

name: Tina
effect: Both players cannot play any SPELL cards until your opponent's next END PHASE.

name: Volcan 300
effect: Add 2000 Power to 1 of your MAMODO cards of your choice until your opponent's next END PHASE.

name: Watch Out!
effect: Negate your opponent's Attack when you win the Battle as a Defender. [All Mamodo]

effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Fein

name: Yellowtail

name: Yopopo {Topopo}
effect: [Declare TO Use] When you are at the last page of your Spell Book, you may not turn a page at your END PHASE. This effect can be played only once per game. (per player). Partner: Djem

name: Yuruk
effect: Whn you win the battle as an Attacker, the next SPELL card you play in the same turn cannot be defended. Mamodo: Fein

name: Yuta Akiyama
effect: Select 1 of your MAMODO cards. Flip a coin; if it's heads, turn the MAMODO card to normal status. If it's tails, add 1000 Power to the MAMODO card during this turn.

name: Zaker
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 1st spell. An electric spell that makes Zatch shoot lightning from his mouth.

name: Zaker
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 1st spell. Depending on the degree of power from within, the strength of the spell changes.

name: Zaker
effect: Damage your opponent's Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zatch Bell
Zatch's 1st spell. "Gather up your inner power!"

name: Zaker
effect: Injure 1 of your opponent's MAMODO cards instead of Damaging their Spell Book when you win the Battle as an Attacker. Mamodo: Zeno
Zeno's 1st spell. "Are you really trying to fight me?"

name: Zatch Bell {Dropout Zatch}
effect: [In Play] Get 1 MP if your MP is less than 2 at the beginning of your START PHASE. Partner: Kiyo Takamine

name: Zatch Bell {Injured Hero}
